text: tam'ma nelegalannu bittu horata a mandiyannu nivu kandira? Avaru saviraru sankhyeyalliddaru, adare maranakke anjiddaru. Allahanu avarodane ‘‘sayiri’’ endanu. A balika avarannu jivantagolisidanu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu manavara palige tumba udaranagiddane. Adare manavaralli heccinavaru krtajnate sallisuvudilla
